ARABIC: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَظْلِمُ ٱلنَّاسَ شَيْـًٔا وَلَٰكِنَّ ٱلنَّاسَ أَنفُسَهُمْ يَظْلِمُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Allah does not wrong people in any way; rather it is people who wrong themselves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Surely God does not wrong anyone; they wrong themselves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Surely Allah does not wrong men; they rather wrong themselves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: God does not do the least bit of injustice to anyone but people wrong themselves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed Allah does not oppress men at all, but they do wrong themselves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Truly, Allah wrongs not mankind in aught; but mankind wrong themselves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely Allah does not do any injustice to men, but men are unjust to themselves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Surely God wrongs not men anything, but themselves men wrong.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! Allah wrongeth not mankind in aught; but mankind wrong themselves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Surely, God does not wrong people at all, but people wrong themselves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily Allah wrongeth not mankind in aught but mankind wrong themselves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed Allah does not wrong people in the least; rather, it is people who wrong themselves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Verily Allah will not deal unjustly with man in aught: It is man that wrongs his own soul.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Truly! Allah wrongs not mankind in aught; but mankind wrong themselves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Indeed, Allah does not wrong mankind a thing, but they wrong themselves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: God does not wrong the people in the least, but the people wrong their own selves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, Allah does not wrong the people at all, but it is the people who are wronging themselves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [10:44] Verily God does not wrong mankind in any way, but mankind wrong themselves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! Allah wrongeth not mankind in aught) He neither decreases their good works nor increases their evil deeds; (but mankind wrong themselves) through disbelief, idolatry and transgressions.
